innerAbility.name: If above Lv.260 & working on 6th job
innerAbility.notes: 6th Job Homing Beacon missiles are increased to 12 missiles and unaffected by all +1 skills

innerAbility.name: For Farming
abilities: Damage to Normal Monsters +8% / Damage to Abnormal Status +8%
innerAbility.notes: 1st Line is based on preference whether 5% extra Meso/Drop is preferred - whichever is not chosen can be the 2nd/3rd Line. Damage to Normal Monster and Abnormal Status are equivalent given the debuff from Support Unit: H-EX when active

attackStats.name: Attack Speed
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Stage 5}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/mechanic-rage.png} tip={Mechanic Rage (2nd Job)} val={+2}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/battle-program.png} tip={Battle Program (3rd Job)} val={+1}>

attackStats.name: STR
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg type={def} sub={opt} src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15% to assigned AP} subSrc={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} subTip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} subVal={extra +400%}>

attackStats.name: Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/humanoid-mech.png} tip={Humanoid Mech (1st Job)} val={+40}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/mechanic-mastery.png} tip={Mechanic Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/extreme-mech.png} tip={Extreme Mech (4th Job)} val={+55}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/loaded-dice.png} tip={Loaded Dice (5th Job)} val={+40}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/overdrive.png} tip={Overdrive (5th Job)} val={+80% of base weapon attack power} val={15% of base weapon power while on cooldown}>

attackStats.name: Crit Rate
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/mechanic-mastery.png} tip={Mechanic Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+15%}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/overclock.png} tip={Overclock (3rd Job)} val={+20%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/tank-mech.png} tip={Tank Mech (3rd Job)} val={+30% in tank form}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/hidden-peace.png} tip={Hidden Peace (Beginner Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/robot-mastery.png} tip={Robot Mastery (4th Job)} val={+45%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/resistance/for-liberty.png} tip={For Liberty (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+20%}>

linkSkill.name: Spirit of Freedom
linkSkill.shortDesc: Grants 12 seconds of invincibility after being revived. Removed upon moving to another map.
details: Can be stacked up to 4 times, once for each unique Resistance character (Except Demons and Xenon) to reach Master Level

build: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/rocket-booster.png} tip={Rocket Booster}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/me-07-drillhands.png} tip={ME-07 Drillhands}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/gatling-gun.png} tip={Gatling Gun}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/humanoid-mech.png} tip={Humanoid Mech}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/open-portal-gx-9.png} tip={Open Portal: GX-9}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/mechanic-mastery.png} tip={Mechanic Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/mechanic-rage.png} tip={Mechanic Rage}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/robo-launcher-rm7.png} tip={Robo Launcher RM7}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/homing-beacon.png} tip={Homing Beacon}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/heavy-gatling-gun.png} tip={Heavy Gatling Gun}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/perfect-armor.png} tip={Perfect Armor}>

<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/overclock.png} tip={Overclock}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/mechanized-defense-system.png} tip={Mechanized Defense System}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/advanced-homing-beacon.png} tip={Advanced Homing Beacon}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/roll-of-the-dice.png} tip={Roll of the Dice}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/rock-n-shock.png} tip={Rock 'n Shock}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/support-unit-h-ex.png} tip={Support Unit: H-EX}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/heavy-salvo.png} tip={Heavy Salvo}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/punch-launcher.png} tip={Punch Launcher}>

<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/homing-beacon-research.png} tip={Homing Beacon Research}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/double-down.png} tip={Double Down}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/extreme-mech.png} tip={Extreme Mech}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/robot-mastery.png} tip={Robot Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/heavy-salvo-plus.png} tip={Heavy Salvo Plus}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/mech-alloy-research.png} tip={Mech Alloy Research}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/enhanced-support-unit.png} tip={Enhanced Support Unit}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/bots-n-tots.png} tip={Bots 'n Tots}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/giant-robot-sg-88.png} tip={Giant Robot SG-88}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/rock-n-shock-reinforce.png} tip={Rock 'n Shock - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/rock-n-shock-guardbreak.png} tip={Rock 'n Shock - Guardbreak}> Rock 'n Shock - Persist and Guardbreak_<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/support-unit-h-ex-party-reinforce.png} tip={Support Unit H-EX - Party Reinforce}> Support Unit - H-EX - Party Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/heavy-salvo-reinforce.png} tip={Heavy Salvo - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/ap-salvo-plus-extra-strike.png} tip={AP Salvo Plus - Extra Strike}> Heavy Salvo - Reinforce and AP Salvo Plus - Extra Strike_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/homing-beacon.png} tip={Homing Beacon (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/heavy-salvo-plus.png} tip={Heavy Salvo Plus and AP Salvo Plus (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/distortion-bomb.png} tip={Distortion Bomb (Hyper Skill)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/robo-launcher-rm7.png} tip={Robo Launcher RM7 (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/rock-n-shock.png} tip={Rock 'n Shock (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/bots-n-tots.png} tip={Bots 'n Tots (4th Job)}>
notes: Either categories can be maxed first based on if you prioritize bossing or mobbing
Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category so that the skills boosted match your priorities
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/me-07-drillhands.png} tip={ME-07 Drillhands (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/gatling-gun.png} tip={Gatling Gun (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/rocket-booster.png} tip={Rocket Booster (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/heavy-gatling-gun.png} tip={Heavy Gatling Gun (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/homing-beacon.png} tip={Homing Beacon (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/robo-launcher-rm7.png} tip={Robo Launcher RM7 (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/punch-launcher.png} tip={Punch Launcher (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/rock-n-shock.png} tip={Rock 'n Shock (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/heavy-salvo.png} tip={Heavy Salvo and AP Salvo (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/support-unit-h-ex.png} tip={Support Unit: H-EX (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/giant-robot-sg-88.png} tip={Giant Robot SG-88 (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/bots-n-tots.png} tip={Bots 'n Tots (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/heavy-salvo-plus.png} tip={Heavy Salvo Plus and AP Salvo Plus (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/distortion-bomb.png} tip={Distortion Bomb (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Gboy, fuegobagel, and the members of the Mechanic Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Skills + Boost Nodes Build + Infographic

primary.name: Crystal Throw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage: 40
primary.desc: Throws a rock that deals fixed damage

primary.name: Infiltrate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Hide for 30 sec, Movement Speed: +15
primary.desc: Turn invisible preventing touch damage

primary.name: Potion Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Recovery Rate: +115%

primary.name: Secret Assembly
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, you move to the Resistance Secret Plaza\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Jet Booster
primary.shortDesc:
Booster Max: 100, All Skill Activation MP Cost: 8
Double Acceleration: While in the air, press the jump or skill key to perform a mid-air jump. Use with the up arrow key to jump upward. Consumes 25 of the booster. Can be used even when not mounted on the Mech, in which case it does not consume any of the booster.
Booster Deployment: While in the air, press the Down key, together with the jump or skill key, to hover in the air at a cost of 25 of the booster per sec.
Mechanic Dash: Press Left twice, Right twice, or, if on the ground, Left/Right plus the skill key to dash in a straight line. If used in the air, consumes 25 of the booster. Cooldown: 0.3 sec.
details: [Double Jump]: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_If combined with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_Can be used while unmmounted_>

[Jet Boosters]: While in the air, holding the Down Arrow Key and the Jump Key or Skill Key together will allow you to hover briefly<bp_You can move while hovering as long you hold onto the Jump Key or Skill Key_>
[Mechanic Dash]: Double-tap the Left or Right Arrow Keys to dash forward<bp_Can be used in the air_>
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys

primary.name: Hidden Peace
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +10%

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/16/End_of_Special_Training} title={"End of Special Training"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Humanoid Mech
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Speed When Mounted: 20, Attack Power: 40, Defense: +300\nPermanently increases Max HP and Max MP by 1500
primary.desc: Mount onto your Humanoid Mech
details: [Passive]: Permanently grants flat Max HP/MP
While mounted, gain increased 100% Knockback Resistance, Attack, DEF and Max Movement Speed

primary.name: Gatling Gun
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Damage: 90%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of projectiles: 4
primary.desc: Fire several bullets that pierces through enemies

primary.name: ME-07 Drillhands
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 31, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 150% to knocked back enemies.
primary.desc: Dash forward and push back enemies hit

primary.name: Rocket Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50 each (launch and land), Damage: 300%, Max Enemies Hit (upon landing): 6\n[Passive Effect - Movement Speed: +22, Max Movement Speed: +20]
primary.desc: Launch upwards before falling back down
details: Can be used to propel up to platforms above you
Can also be activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Attack Key together
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys

primary.name: Heavy Gatling Gun
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Damage: 160%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of projectiles: 6
primary.desc: Fire several bullets that pierces through enemies

primary.name: Homing Beacon
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 65, Damage: 210%, Max Enemy Hit: 4 at once
primary.desc: While held, launches homing missiles that seek out nearby enemies
details: Right-clicking the skill toggles the smoke visual effect ON/OFF
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Can be used while using other skills
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Open Portal: GX-9
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Portal Duration: 300 sec, cannot be used for 2 seconds after use.
primary.desc: Place down a portal that allows you and your party members to freely move between
details: 2 portals within range of each other must be placed for them to function
There is a brief cooldown after using a portal before they can be used again
Right-clicking the skill toggles party member use ON/OFF

primary.name: Mechanic Rage
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Attack Speed increased for 180 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Perfect Armor
primary.shortDesc: Ability One - While mounting your mech, it has a 20% chance to guard against attacks (permanent)\nAbility Two - Reflects 500% damage back to enemies (when skill is active)
primary.desc: While toggled, reflect back damage taken
details: [Passive]: Permanently grants a chance to dodge attacks when mounted on your mech

primary.name: Robo Launcher RM7
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Robo Launcher Duration: 70 sec\nDamage: 250%, After duration is exceeded - Max Enemies Hit: 6, Self-Destruct Damage: 400%
primary.desc: Summon a stationary sentry that attacks enemies in front of it
details: At the end of the duration, the sentry explodes dealing damage to nearby enemies
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Mechanic Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20, Weapon Mastery: +50%, Critical Rate: +15%, Critical Damage: +5%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Tank Mech
primary.shortDesc: Tank Mode MP Cost: 50 plus 10 MP every 5 sec, Regular Attack: 100%, Regular Attack Critical Rate: +30%
primary.desc: Mount onto your Tank Mech that gains increased %Crit Rate

primary.name: Heavy Salvo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Fire a barrage of bullets forward
details: Usable only in <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/humanoid-mech.png} tip={Humanoid Mech (1st Job)}> Humanoid Mode
Shares the same SP and Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/ap-salvo.png} tip={AP Salvo (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: AP Salvo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 6, Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Fire a concentrated bullet that pierces enemies
details: Usable only in <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/tank-mech.png} tip={Tank Mech (3rd Job)}> Tank Mode
Shares the same SP and Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/heavy-salvo.png} tip={Heavy Salvo (3rd Job)}>
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first

primary.name: Support Unit: H-EX
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Deploys H-EX and reduces Defense of monsters on the map by -10% for 80 sec. Restores 8% of HP for you and nearby party members every 5 sec. After skill duration ends, self-destructs inflicting 500% damage.\n[Passive Effects - Status Resistance: +40, Elemental Resistance: +40%]
primary.desc: Place down a stationary robot that debuffs all enemies and restores %Max HP to nearby allies every few seconds
details: [Debuff]: Reduces %DEF<bp_Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF_>
[Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance
At the end of the duration, the robot explodes dealing damage to nearby enemies

primary.name: Punch Launcher
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 1, Enemies Hit with Knock-back Attack: 10.
primary.desc: Launch a fist forward that pushes enemies back

primary.name: Roll of the Dice
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Buff Duration: 180 sec\nCooldown: 200 sec
primary.desc: Grants a buff depending on the number rolled
details: [One]: Reduces cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/common/roll-of-the-dice.png} tip={Roll of the Die (3rd Job)}> by 50%
[Two]: Increases %DEF
[Three]: Increases %Max HP/MP
[Four]: Increases %Crit Rate
[Five]: Increases %Damage
[Six]: Increases %EXP Rate

primary.name: Rock 'n Shock
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, When 3 coils are placed - Tesla Coil Duration: 70 sec\nDamage: 200%, Max Monsters Hit Near Your Level Hit: 10, Stuns when attack lands, After duration is exceeded - Max Enemies Hit: 6, Self-Destruct Damage: 550%
primary.desc: Place down 3 robots that continuously attack and stun enemies
details: At the end of the duration, the robots explode dealing damage to nearby enemies
If no robots are active, pressing the Down Arrow Key with the Skill Key will place 3 robots at once
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Overclock
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: 42%, Critical Rate: 20%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +30%

primary.name: Advanced Homing Beacon
primary.shortDesc: Homing Beacon Damage: +300%
details: Increases %Damage of attack

primary.name: Mechanized Defense System
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +30%, Max MP: +30%, DEF: +750, Damage Ignored: 15%

primary.name: Battle Program
primary.shortDesc: Increases Humanoid Mech's Attack Speed by 1, Movement Speed by 10.\nDecreases Rocket Booster Recoil Distance and increases Mechanic Dash Movement Range

primary.name: Heavy Salvo Plus
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 390%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Fire an explosive blast forward
details: Usable only in <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/humanoid-mech.png} tip={Humanoid Mech (1st Job)}> Humanoid Mode
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/ap-salvo-plus.png} tip={AP Salvo Plus (4th Job)}>

primary.name: AP Salvo Plus
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 90, First Hit has Damage: 285%, Number of Attacks: 6, Enemies Hit: 6.\n2nd Explosion: Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 1
primary.desc: Fire an explosive bullet that pierces enemies
details: Usable only in <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/tank-mech.png} tip={Tank Mech (3rd Job)}> Tank Mode
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/heavy-salvo-plus.png} tip={Heavy Salvo Plus (4th Job)}>
Upon hitting an enemy, the bullet explodes damaging nearby enemies
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first

primary.name: Giant Robot SG-88
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 400, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 8. Damage to Nearby Enemies: 1300% per sec, Number of Attacks: 2. Invincible for 3 sec after using the skill.\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Tap the Attack Key to charge up and release a devastating attack
details: Charging will increase the %Damage dealt
While charging, you are invincible
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Bots 'n Tots
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Robot Factory Duration: 70 sec\nSelf-Destruct Damage: 500%, Max enemies Hit: 4, Max Toy Robots Summoned: 3, Summon Interval: Every 3 sec, After duration is exceeded - Self-Destruct Damage: 1000%, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Place down a robot factory that deploys robots that chase enemies and self-destructs
details: At the end of the duration, the robot factory explodes dealing damage to nearby enemies
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Enhanced Support Unit
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage +7% for yourself and all your party members, self-destruction damage increased to 1100%, HP recovery range increased.
details: Now grants %Final Damage to you and your party members and the auto-recovery ranged has been increased
%Damage of self-destruct has also been increased

primary.name: Homing Beacon Research
primary.shortDesc: Bonus Homing Beacon missiles: +5
details: Increases the number of <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/homing-beacon.png} tip={Homing Beacon (2nd Job)}> homing missiles fired

primary.name: Extreme Mech
primary.shortDesc: Hop on your Humanoid Mech for these effects. Attack Power: +55, Defense: +600\nWeapon Mastery: +70%

primary.name: Robot Mastery
primary.shortDesc:
Damage: +45%.
Robot's Final Damage and Final Self-Destruct Damage: +105%
Summon Duration for skills aside from 5th skills: +40%.
<Robo Launcher RM7> Damage: +135% points.
details: Right-clicking the skill will toggle a function ON/OFF that allows skill effect transparency to apply to robot skills affected by Robot Mastery

primary.name: Double Down
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, 50% chance of rolling a Double Down, Buff Duration: 180 sec\nCooldown: 180 sec
details: Grants a chance to roll two dices at once

primary.name: Mech Alloy Research
primary.shortDesc: Dodge Chance: 15%, Damage Taken -30% upon failure to dodge\nThis skill permanently increases Max HP by 40% and Max MP by 10%.
primary.desc: Grants a dodge chance and increases %Damage Reduction
details: Additionally, permanently increases %Max HP/MP

hyperPassive.name: Heavy Salvo - Reinforce
hyperPassive.desc: Increases the %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/heavy-salvo-plus.png} tip={Heavy Salvo Plus (4th Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/ap-salvo-plus.png} tip={AP Salvo Plus (4th Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Heavy Salvo Plus - Spread
hyperPassive.desc: Increases the number of enemies hit by <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/heavy-salvo-plus.png} tip={Heavy Salvo Plus (4th Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: AP Salvo Plus - Extra Strike
hyperPassive.desc: Increases the number of hits per attack of <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/ap-salvo-plus.png} tip={AP Salvo Plus (4th Job)}>

hyperActive.name: Full Spread
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Duration: 10 sec, Additional Missiles: 6\nCooldown: 60 sec
hyperActive.desc: Increases the number of <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/homing-beacon.png} tip={Homing Beacon (2nd Job)}> homing missiles fired

hyperActive.name: Distortion Bomb
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 250, Duration: 4 sec., Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 2\nCooldown: 8 sec
hyperActive.desc: Deploy a bomb that continuously damages enemies in an area
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: For Liberty
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Demon, Resistance, and Xenon party members.

fifthMain.name: Doomsday Device
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 750, summoned machine lasts 100 sec and arsenal includes Gatling guns and missiles
Gatling Gun - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 440%, Number of Attacks: 6, Cooldown: 1.5 sec
Missiles - Fires 2 missiles to hit up to 12 enemies, Damage: 650%, Number of Attacks: 3, Cooldown: 8 sec
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summon a machine that follows you and attacks nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Mobile Missile Battery
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Launches a battery that fires 40 micro missiles at up to 15 enemies.\nMicro missiles deal 935% damage 5 times.\nCooldown: 25 sec
fifthMain.desc: Release a canister of missiles that unloads on nearby enemies
details: Prioritize bosses with the highest HP first

fifthMain.name: Full Metal Barrage
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1500, Can hold key down for up to 8 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 880%, Number of Attacks: 12.
When Homing Beacon is used during casting, 7 additional Beacons are fired, can be stacked with Full Spread. Final Damage: +67%
Cannot use Homing Beacon for 2 sec after skill ends.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While held, violently fire at enemies in front of you
details: You are invincible while casting but you cannot move or change directions

Can fire <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/homing-beacon.png} tip={Homing Beacon (2nd Job)}> while casting<bp_Increases %Final Damage of homing missiles and fires additional missiles while active_You cannot use <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/homing-beacon.png} tip={Homing Beacon (2nd Job)}> for a short period after casting this skill_>

fifthMain.name: Mecha Carrier
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1250. Summons a Mecha Carrier for 50 sec.
11 carrier-based aircraft(s) attack, then return. With each charge after that, 1 additional carrier-based aircraft(s) will join the sortie. Up to 16 carrier-based aircraft(s) can attack in total.
Carrier-Based Aircraft: Attacks the targets 4 time(s) with 550% damage, then returns.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summon a stationary air carrier above you that fires homing aircrafts at enemies
details: Each time the aircrafts hit an enemy, an additional aircraft will spawn (up to 16 max)
If you move too far, the air carrier will teleport to your location
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/heavy-salvo-plus.png} tip={Heavy Salvo Plus and AP Salvo Plus (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Heavy Salvo Plus
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 90, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 745%, Number of Attacks: 4
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA AP Salvo Plus
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 105, fires armor-piercing shells\n1st hit - Max Enemies Hit: 7, Piercing Damage: 570%, Number of Attacks: 6\n2nd explosion - Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 390%, Number of Attacks: 3
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/homing-beacon.png} tip={Homing Beacon (2nd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Homing Beacon
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 550% at once
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 3rd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/distortion-bomb.png} tip={Distortion Bomb (Hyper Skill)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Distortion Bomb
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 280, Duration: 4 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 720%, Number of Attacks: 2
Cooldown: 8 sec
Enhance with Distortion Bomb 25 sec
Intense Distortion Bomb: MP Cost: 300, Duration: 2 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1240%, Number of Attacks: 3, then explodes to attack up to 8 enemies 15 times to inflict 1990% damage
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 4th Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/robo-launcher-rm7.png} tip={Robo Launcher RM7 (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/rock-n-shock.png} tip={Rock 'n Shock (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/bots-n-tots.png} tip={Bots 'n Tots (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Robo Launcher RM7
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 54, Robo Launcher Duration: 98 sec\nDamage: 605%, Max Enemies Hit: 2, After duration is exceeded - Max Enemies Hit: 6, Self-Destruct Damage: 825%, Number of Attacks: 3
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Rock 'n Shock
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 90, When 3 coils are placed - Tesla Coil Duration: 98 sec.\nDamage: 1095%, Max Enemies Near Your Level Hit: 10, Stuns when attack lands, After duration is exceeded - Max Enemies Hit: 6, Self-Destruct Damage: 1006%, Number of Attacks: 3\n[Passive Effect - HEXA AP Salvo Plus's 2nd Explosive Attack Damage: +160% points]
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Bots 'n Tots
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 125, Robot Factory Duration: 98 sec\nSelf-Destruct Damage: 825%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 3, Toy Robots Summoned: 3, Summon Interval: Every 3 sec, After duration is exceeded - Self-Destruct Damage: 930%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 5
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: Robo Conversion: CB-P1
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 54, Summons a nodebot. Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 640%, Number of Attacks: 4. Using HEXA Robo Launcher RM7, HEXA Rock 'n Shock, or HEXA Bots 'n Tots enhances nodebot by 1 level.
Level 1: Periodically deals damage. Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 770%, Number of Attacks: 6
Level 2: Periodically deals damage. Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1010%, Number of Attacks: 7
Level 3: Periodically deals damage. Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1230%, Number of Attacks: 8
masteryCore.desc: While toggled, summons a robot that fights alongside you
details: While the robot is summoned, using the following skills will upgrade the robot instead of placing down a summon: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/robo-launcher-rm7.png} tip={Robo Launcher RM7 (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/rock-n-shock.png} tip={Rock 'n Shock (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/mechanic/bots-n-tots.png} tip={Bots 'n Tots (4th Job)}><bp_Each upgrade increases the robot's %Damage and Number of Attacks (up to Level 3)_Each upgrade is affected by %Summon Duration_>
Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

skillCore.name: Ground Zero
skillCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1800, invincible during casting
Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 2040%, Number of Attacks: 8, Number of Earthquakes: 10, then Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1980%, Number of Attacks: 15, Number of Explosions: 32
Massive Bombardment - Duration: 30 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Bombardment Damage: 2888%, Number of Attacks: 15
Cooldown: 360 sec

skillCore.name: Mechanized Extinction
skillCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Invincible during casting\nThe mech launches 25 bombardments, dealing 7983% damage to up to 15 enemies 15 times\nIgnore Defense: +60%, Boss Damage: +40%, Critical Rate: 100%

notable.name: HEXA Heavy / AP Salvo Plus 6th Job

meta: Mechanic is a DEX pirate class part of the Resistance class group. What makes Mechanics unique is their ability to ride and attack on their mech and deploy different kinds of utility
